From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>

** Carnage moved slightly so that she was more comfortable, though on nights 
like this she liked the idea of a nice warm bed by a heater much better. 
Especially when she was soaked and cold and basically hungry. But the hunger 
could be tolerated and so could the cold so nothing was really that much of 
a big deal.
The thunder rolled and the lightning flashed, and Carnage smiled at 
remembering an old saying that she had heard back on Cybertron, when she had 
once been afraid of thunder because it hurt her ears.** " The thunder rolled 
and lightning flashed and Heaven and Earth were shaken, the little pig 
curled up his tail and ran to save his beacon." ** She chuckled at that, 
thinking how much that actually fit into her situation. Only that the pig 
was dead and was going to be made into beacon in a day or so. How ironic.
By this time Teltoli was snug beside her and had her head on her paws, after 
explaining in surprise about the title Carnage had mentioned.
But, even with the slight smile on her face she listened to the cat with fur 
and feathers, thinking that she had gotten the wrong picture of what she had 
tried to say.** " I didn't mean that sort of title."
** Carnage sighed and lowered her snout so that she was looking Teltoli in 
the face.** " I meant one where you go and prove to yourself that you're 
more grown then everyone says. Because if you're just in it to make yourself 
feel and seem more adult, then you're in it for the wrong reason." ** 
Carnage sighed. How was she going to explain this?** " You have to like 
combat and beating the Pit out of yourself to reach your goals. You have to 
be in it for the benefits that you CAN protect yourself and have the 
knowledge to protect others. It's not a personality booster, it's the 
opposite." ** But Carnage leaned her head back and lifted a brow ridge.** " 
But you have that determined glint in you eye that I've seen that says you 
won't back down until you get what you want. So..to save me weeks of nagging 
and pleading I'll give you a chance to prove yourself in just how much you 
want what you're asking for."
** Carnage moved a bit so that she was facing away from Teltoli.** " It's 
the only chance I'm giving you because in war failure is fatal and a dead 
bot has no second chances." ** She curled in around herself like a big brown 
cat and lay her head down my her feet.**
" We start at dawn."
** And with that she closed herself and prepared for sleep.**
